chat_complete_title: [IS] Congratulations! You have completed all stages.
chat_complete_message: [IS] Project completed! Click on any stage to view its guidance and questions.

blueprint_market_research_error: [IS] Sorry, an error occurred during research.

welcome_idea_placeholder: [IS] Describe your startup idea in a sentence or two.

welcome_delete_confirm: [IS] Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.
welcome_alert_overwrite_confirm: [IS] A project with this ID already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
welcome_alert_invalid_file: [IS] The imported file is invalid or corrupted.
welcome_no_projects: [IS] No projects yet. Start a new journey!
